items.title: 'What should we do?' Seeking clarity in Tehran as Israeli jets fly overhead
items.description: BBC Persian's Kasra Naji says his sister is among those who want to know where the conflict with Israel is leading.

items.title: Kenyan 'miracle babies' pastor dies in road crash
items.description: Televangelist Gilbert Deya has died in an accident and at least 30 other people are reportedly injured.

items.title: Lone Air India survivor carries coffin of brother killed in crash
items.description: A visibly upset Ramesh was overcome with grief carrying his brother's coffin to the crematorium.

items.title: Trump weighs joining Iran strikes after calling for 'unconditional surrender'
items.description: US strikes could involve using superior weaponry to hit an underground nuclear site, sources say.

items.title: Lawyer who defended drug lord 'El Chapo' elected as judge
items.description: Silvia Delgado was one of the most controversial candidates to run in Mexico's judicial election.
